title: Ticket #2757: Requestmemory reqs different depending on order in submission
description:
Putting the following in the job's submission description file:

Requirements = ( ( RequestMemory ! undefined ) && ( Target.Memory >= My.RequestMemory ) )

Results in a Requirments value of:

( ( ( RequestMemory ! undefined ) && ( Target.Memory >= My.RequestMemory ) ) ) && ( TARGET.Arch == "X86_64" ) && ( TARGET.OpSys == "LINUX" ) && ( TARGET.Disk >= DiskUsage ) && ( TARGET.FileSystemDomain == MY.FileSystemDomain )

But if we change the order of the expressions to:

Requirements = ( ( Target.Memory >= My.RequestMemory ) && ( RequestMemory ! undefined ) )

It results in the following:

( ( ( Target.Memory >= My.RequestMemory ) && ( RequestMemory ! undefined ) ) ) && ( TARGET.Arch == "X86_64" ) && ( TARGET.OpSys == "LINUX" ) && ( TARGET.Disk >= DiskUsage ) && ( ( RequestMemory * 1024 ) >= ImageSize ) && ( TARGET.FileSystemDomain == MY.FileSystemDomain )
